data: Stanley Richard Colton, M. D., heaved his powerful form to and fro in his bed and cursed the day he had come to Montant Point, which chanced to be the day just ended.
STANLEY RICHARD COLTON, M. D., heaved his powerful form to and fro in his bed and cursed the day he had come to Montant Point, which chanced to be the day just ended.
Adams, Samuel Hopkins, 1871-1958; Macauley, C. R. (Charles Raymond), 1871-1934 [Illustrator]
